nodes.text: Corporal Jorda Pell was a female Human soldier of the Galactic Republic and a member of the Safecrackers, where she served as a forward assault.

If the player is a female Trooper in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, then Ava Jaxo invites Pell and Keran Vondi to her apartment along with the player; however, if the player is male, the player meets up with Jaxo alone.
